scripts.build-prod-md:co: npm run build-prod-md-co-external & npm run build-prod-md-co-internal
scripts.build-prod-md-co-external: npm run build-prod-md-co-external-en & npm run build-prod-md-co-external-fr
scripts.build-prod-md-co-external-en: ng run md-co:build:production-external-en & npm run postBuild --template=md-co-external --language=en
scripts.build-prod-md-co-external-fr: ng run md-co:build:production-external-fr & npm run postBuild --template=md-co-external --language=fr
scripts.build-prod-md-co-internal: npm run build-prod-md-co-internal-en & npm run build-prod-md-co-internal-fr
scripts.build-prod-md-co-internal-en: ng run md-co:build:production-internal-en & npm run postBuild --template=md-co-internal --language=en
scripts.build-prod-md-co-internal-fr: ng run md-co:build:production-internal-fr & npm run postBuild --template=md-co-internal --language=fr
scripts.build-prod-md:rt: npm run build-prod-md-rt-en & npm run build-prod-md-rt-fr
scripts.build-prod-md-rt-en: ng run md-rt:build:production-en & npm run postBuild --template=md-rt --language=en
scripts.build-prod-md-rt-fr: ng run md-rt:build:production-fr & npm run postBuild --template=md-rt --language=fr
scripts.build-prod-md:ai: npm run build-prod-md-ai-en & npm run build-prod-md-ai-fr
scripts.build-prod-md-ai-en: ng run md-ai:build:production-en & npm run postBuild --template=md-ai --language=en
scripts.build-prod-md-ai-fr: ng run md-ai:build:production-fr & npm run postBuild --template=md-ai --language=fr
scripts.lib:watch: ng build @hpfb/sdk --watch --configuration development & npm run copy-rep-css  --watch --verbose
